overview: Don Ye, Founder and Managing Partner, has been a venture investor for the past ten years in both Silicon Valley and China. He pioneered paradigm shift in cleantech venture investment. By establishing Tsing Capital in 2001, he was able to strategically position it as the first cleantech VC firm with focus on the environment. He has witnessed and experienced the evolution of this sector, beginning with challenges in finding environmental protection investments to explosive growth in cleantech investment.

degrees.subject: Economics
degrees.institution: University of International Business and Economics
